mapper.select: SELECT managePeriod as title,COUNT(*) as number FROM tb_trainee GROUP BY managePeriod
select * from tb_trainee where traineename like CONCAT('%', #{traineename}, '%')
select * from tb_trainee where traineecode like CONCAT('%', #{traineecode}, '%')
SELECT * FROM tb_trainee where user_idioctonia>=#{user_idioctonia} or user_getaway>=#{user_getaway} or user_suddendeath>=#{user_suddendeath} or user_wound>=#{user_wound}
